WIMIN Ideathon, 2017

Change At Hand

Addressed lacking political engagement by designing a mobile application that connects political trends to concrete policy information and action plans. After generating personas, low-fidelity prototypes, and market research in under 24 hours, our pitch was awarded “Pitch with Most Community Impact” at the 2017 WIMIN Ideathon

Date

January, 2017

Location

Waterloo, Ontario
